goals__remit: PlasticsEurope is one of the leading European trade associations with centres in Brussels, Frankfurt, London, Madrid, Milan and Paris. We are networking with European and national plastics associations and have more than 100 member companies, producing over 90% of all polymers across the EU28 member states plus Norway, Switzerland and Turkey.
relevant_communication:
Polytalk provides a platform for different viewpoints to facilitate a constructive dialogue between policy makers, high-level industry representatives and other relevant key players to address a range of issues. PolyTalk 2014 hosted in Brussels a combination of keynotes speeches from world industry leaders, international economists and high-level policy makers, lively discussion panels and breakout sessions to work on the competitiveness of the Plastics industry. 
 
Organised since 1997, IdentiPlast was born from the idea that plastics are too valuable to be thrown away. It consists of discussion panels and keynote speeches on identification, sorting, collection, recycling and energy recovery technologies and markets for plastic waste. Identiplast initially was held in Brussels but now travels to European metropolises.
